title: Moon Phase Watch
summary: Watch Face that shows the current phase of the Moon, month, day and date.
description: An elegant watch face that shows the current moon phase, month, day of week and date.Designed for square, round and Moto 360 (gen 1 & 2) Android Wear watches.In ambient mode, the hour and minute hands are shown along with the moon phase.In detailed ambient mode, month, day of week and date are shown in addition to whats shown in minimal ambient mode.For users in the southern hemisphere wherever daylight savings time is observed, the correct moon phase for the southern hemisphere is shown.- Option to toggle between minimal & detailed ambient mode.- Option to toggle between hand shadows and no hand shadows.- Option to toggle between tick and sweep second hand motion.If you like it, please rate and check out the free version also.Please email us if you face any issues and do check out our other designs as well.
descriptionHTML:
An elegant watch face that shows the current moon phase, month, day of week and date.

Designed for square, round and Moto 360 (gen 1 & 2) Android Wear watches.

In ambient mode, the hour and minute hands are shown along with the moon phase.
In detailed ambient mode, month, day of week and date are shown in addition to whats shown in minimal ambient mode.

For users in the southern hemisphere wherever daylight savings time is observed, the correct moon phase for the southern hemisphere is shown.

- Option to toggle between minimal & detailed ambient mode.
- Option to toggle between hand shadows and no hand shadows.
- Option to toggle between tick and sweep second hand motion.

If you like it, please rate and check out the free version also.


Please email us if you face any issues and do check out our other designs as well.
comments: In order to get the face to work is to install on phone and then go to play store on watch and install on the watch to. Works perfect. It must a problem aw2 to Auto install.
Doesn't work.  Same experience as other user. Google play Open button missing.  No icon in Android Wear.  No icon on desktop.
Uninstall it and reninstall it. And not showing up at all. On my Huawei P9. .Does not exist..and NO way around of getting refund on Google play..üëçüëç

Purchased it, but can't find it. I looked in my apps and widgets, but I can't see it. When I did a search it seems to not have been installed. All I have as an option now is "refund". I'd like to install it, though. Any help would be appreciated. Update -Thanks for replying. I will email you.

Nice face Nice face, looks and works great. My only complaint is the ambient face a little too simple, I would like a little more detail.  Update: Thanks for listening to me and adding more ambient detail .... perfect!
